headline: UAW reaches tentative agreement with GE

headline: The S&P 500 Stock Best Positioned To Power AI Data Centers Is The IBD Stock Of The Day
summary: GE Vernova is Monday's IBD Stock Of The Day, with the S&P 500 component trading in a buy zone in stock market action after receiving a bullish upgrade as analysts see further 18% upside with demand for energy expected to be a long-term positive for the company.  Melius Research analyst Rob Wertheimer on Monday upgraded GE Vernova to a buy rating from the previous hold designation and now has a 740 price target on the shares.  Wertheimer noted that GEV is up more than 400% since General Electric wrapped up its big, long-term breakup last year and that there remains a lot of room for "surprise to the upside on sell-side estimates moving toward 2027 and beyond."
